dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
Y. Naddaf
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: The Atari Learning Environment is an evaluation platform for general agents, providing a suite of Atari 2600 games for testing reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Atari Learning Environment

dcterms:creator: A. Tampuu
T. Matiisen
D. Kodelja
I. Kuzovkin
K. Korjus
J. Aru
R. Vicente
dcterms:description: Pong is an Atari game used to study multiagent cooperation and competition with deep reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Pong (Atari Game)

dcterms:creator: M. Samvelyan
T. Rashid
C. Schroeder de Witt
G. Farquhar
N. Nardelli
T. G. J. Rudner
C.-M. Hung
P. H. S. Torr
J. Foerster
S. Whiteson
dcterms:description: The Starcraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC) is a benchmark for evaluating multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithms in the context of the Starcraft game.
dcterms:title: Starcraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC)

dcterms:description: A simple matrix game used to evaluate the resilience of algorithms to coordination issues in multi-agent reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Matrix Game

dcterms:description: A complex predator-prey type game where cowboys try to catch a bull, used to evaluate multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Cowboy Bull Game
